meanings.definition: To regard with deep, often rapturous love.
meanings.sent1: I adore my fluffy cat with all my heart.
meanings.sent2: She adores her grandmother and spends every weekend with her.
meanings.sent3: The puppy adores his squeaky toy more than anything else.
meanings.sent4: The artist adores the canvas, pouring emotions into every stroke.
meanings.sent5: The child's eyes lit up with adoration as she hugged her favorite teddy bear.

meanings.definition: To worship or honor as a deity.
meanings.sent1: The villagers adore the ancient tree in the center of the town.
meanings.sent2: In some cultures, people adore multiple gods and goddesses.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to adore the sunlight streaming through the window.
meanings.sent4: The fans adore the singer like a divine being, attending every concert.
meanings.sent5: The devotees adore the temple, offering prayers with utmost reverence.

meanings.sent1: I adore chocolate ice cream, it's my favorite treat.
meanings.sent2: He adores playing basketball with his friends on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The little girl adores her new doll, carrying it everywhere.
meanings.sent4: She adores the beach, finding peace in the sound of the waves.
meanings.sent5: The gardener adores his plants, tending to them with care and affection.
